TEXT.TITLE: GENERAL INSTRUMENT <GRL> GETS CONTRACT
TEXT.BODY: General Instrument Corp has received a 36.0 mln dlr contract for electronic support work for P-3C Orion anti-submarine warfare planes and SH-2F anti-submarine helicopters, the Navy said. REUTER
